statements: DELETE FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM FleetVehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND schedule LIKE '%Monday%';
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE vehicle_id = 3 AND destination = 'New York';
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE destination = 'New York';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE status = 'Broken' AND location = 'Garage';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_name = 'SUV' AND last_service < '2021-12-01';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM locations WHERE location_name = 'Warehouse');
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE vehicle_id = (SELECT vehicle_id FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_name = 'Truck A')
